column4: how can i remove the mail icon from the tool bar in ubuntu 11.10 ?
i'm not sure if it's the same in 11.10, but in 10.10 it was sudo apt-get remove indicator-messages && killall gnome-panel
what is the && killall gnome-panel going to do ?
that is, if 11.04 even usues the panel anymore
it might be that gnome-panel is not used in 11.04 (i don't know this)
thanks and yeah looks like the -panel is missing. i rebooted before i got that last msg
it was a icon id never use
